SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Result

java.lang.Object
cycling.Result
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Result extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a set of results a rider can get on a stage Stores the times of start, finish, and each checkpoint pass in a stage
See Also:

      public Result()

  • Method Details

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Gets the ID of the rider who got the results, each result should have a unique ID
      Returns:
      int ID of result

    • setID

      public void setID(int newId)
      Sets ID of rider, should be unique and only be set at result creation to avoid issues
      Parameters:
      newId - unique int ID number to identify the rider who got the results

    • getCheckpointTimes

      public LocalTime[] getCheckpointTimes()
      Gets all of the times the rider got from start time, each checkpoint and finish
      Returns:
      LocalTime array of times of start, checkpoint crosses, finish

    • setCheckpointTimes

      public void setCheckpointTimes(LocalTime[] newTimes)
      Sets the times of the rider. Should have entries = num of stage checkpoints + 2 To set a single time, see setCheckpointTime(java.time.LocalTime, int)
      Parameters:
      newTimes - Array of LocalTime values

    • setCheckpointTime

      public void setCheckpointTime(LocalTime newTime, int checkpointReplaced)
      Sets the time of a single checkpoint
      Parameters:
      newTime - LocalTime of the time to set
      checkpointReplaced - which checkpoint the time is being updated for, in order of start, checkpoints, finish To change the finish time, pass in the size of the results - 1

    • getTotalTime

      public long getTotalTime()
      Gets the total time in milliseconds a rider took on a stage from start to finish
      Returns:
      long of the total time in milliseconds No setter for this value, it should be automatically calculated when checkpoint times are assigned

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
